title: nf-cmgg/exomecnv pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

batch.errorMessage: Batch name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

family.errorMessage: Family name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

cram.errorMessage: CRAM or BAM file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.cram' or '.bam'

crai.errorMessage: index of CRAM or BAM file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.crai' or '.bai' or '.csi'

bed.errorMessage: Per base BED file can be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bed' or '.bed.gz'. This file will supercede usage of the bam/cram input.

bed_index.errorMessage: index of BED file is optional but must be provided when using a bed.gz file

vcf.errorMessage: VCF is optional but must be provided when only annotating

vcf_index.errorMessage: index of VCF file is optional but must be provided when only annotating

roi.errorMessage: ROI BED file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bed'
